column4: Can anyone help me I am trying to install Dapper and I am confused at the partitioner spot
I am guessing you have Windows XP installed?
Yes I do lol I am at the prepare partitions section
How much RAM do you have?
OK, I am actually unfamiliar with the graphical installer, but I have installed loads of times manually :) I would make a new partition which is 512MB
Format that partition as "swap", then use the rest of the disc as "/"
